title: This Isn't Your Typical Car HUD: Checking Out Hyundai Mobis Holographic Windshield Display video

Well, I'm trying out a concept car from Hyundai Mobis that puts everything on the windshield in a new type of technology. This isn't a typical HUD. You ever been a passenger and you kind of want to eyeball what the driver's doing, you won't be able to get that in this concept because there's nothing on the dash. It's all just my. Little secret over here. So while I'm focused on the road, the passenger can do things like watch movies, play games.
